statements: SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT code_value, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50.00;
SELECT DISTINCT code_value FROM discount_codes;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT code_id, code_value, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE code_value LIKE 'DIS%';
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE code_value = 'SUMMER25'
SELECT code_value, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50
SELECT code_id, code_value, discount_amount FROM discount_codes ORDER BY discount_amount DESC
SELECT code_value, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE code_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE code_value LIKE '%SAVE%';
SELECT * FROM discount_codes
SELECT code_id, discount_code FROM discount_codes
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE discount_code_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT discount_code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount < 30 ORDER BY discount_code ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions INNER JOIN discount_codes ON transactions.discount_code_id = discount_codes.code_id;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes;
SELECT code_id, code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT code_id, code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT code_id, SUM(discount_amount) AS total_discount FROM discount_codes GROUP BY code_id;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100.00 AND customer_id = 5;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50.00 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.customer_id, t.transaction_date, dc.code FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_discounts td ON t.transaction_id = td.transaction_id JOIN discount_codes dc ON td.code_id = dc.code_id ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes;
SELECT code_id, code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50.00 ORDER BY code DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount = 25.00 AND code LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM discount_codes ORDER BY code_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT c.name, d.code FROM customers c JOIN customers_discounts cd ON c.customer_id = cd.customer_id JOIN discount_codes d ON cd.code_id = d.code_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, customers.name, discount_codes.code, transactions.total_amount FROM transactions INNER JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN transactions_discounts ON transactions.transaction_id = transactions_discounts.transaction_id INNER JOIN discount_codes ON transactions_discounts.code_id = discount_codes.code_id WHERE discount_applied = true;

SELECT customers.name, customers.email, discount_codes.code, discount_codes.discount_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN customers_discounts ON customers.customer_id = customers_discounts.customer_id LEFT JOIN discount_codes ON customers_discounts.code_id = discount_codes.code_id;

SELECT customers.name, transactions.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name ORDER BY transactions.total_amount DESC;
SELECT code, COUNT(code_id) AS code_usage FROM discount_codes INNER JOIN transactions_discounts ON discount_codes.code_id = transactions_discounts.code_id GROUP BY code ORDER BY code_usage DESC;
